## Summary / Кратко

Explain what changed and why.

Опишите, что изменилось и зачем.

## Type / Тип

- [ ] Documentation change (`docs/`)
- [ ] Install scripts change (`scripts/`)
- [ ] Examples change (`examples/`)
- [ ] Release packaging/artifacts change (`releases/`)
- [ ] Other

Describe what you ran and on which platform.

Опишите, что вы проверили и на какой платформе.

## Notes / Примечания

Anything reviewers should pay attention to (backward compatibility, docs alignment EN/RU, etc.).

## Checklist / Чеклист

- [ ] No secrets/tokens added to the repo.
- [ ] Links and paths are correct.
- [ ] If docs exist in both EN and RU, I updated both (or explained why not).
- [ ] If examples changed, I ran at least one example with `intertonc --run`.
- [ ] If install scripts changed, I tested the relevant OS flow (or explained constraints).
